text: Wau (, WƒÅw), also known as Wow, Waw or Wau Town, is a city in northwestern South Sudan. It lies on the western bank of the Jur River and is the capital of Western Bahr el Ghazal (and formerly Wau State). ==Notable people== *Luol Deng, basketball player. *Thon Maker, basketball player. *Alek Wek, model. Category:Cities in Africa Category:Geography of South Sudan
title: Wau, South Sudan
